ModeSERVER
Description
Transaction
System History
System Search
Resource TypeProfileReadV-ReadSearchUpdateCreateDelete
OperationDefinitionhttp://hl7.org/fhir/Profile/OperationDefinitiony
Questionnairehttp://ehealth.sundhed.dk/fhir/StructureDefinition/ehealth-questionnaireyyyyyy
StructureDefinitionhttp://ehealth.sundhed.dk/fhir/StructureDefinition/ehealth-definedquestionyyyyyy

searchParam.name: _content
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: _has
searchParam.documentation: Return resources linked to by the given target

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: _language
searchParam.documentation: The language of the resource

searchParam.name: _lastUpdated
searchParam.documentation: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

searchParam.name: _profile
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given profile

searchParam.name: _security
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given security labels

searchParam.name: _tag
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given tag

searchParam.name: _text
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: A code that corresponds to one of its items in the questionnaire

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The questionnaire publication date

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: The description of the questionnaire

searchParam.name: effective
searchParam.documentation: The time during which the questionnaire is intended to be in use

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: External identifier for the questionnaire

searchParam.name: jurisdiction
searchParam.documentation: Intended jurisdiction for the questionnaire

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Computationally friendly name of the questionnaire

searchParam.name: publisher
searchParam.documentation: Name of the publisher of the questionnaire

searchParam.name: reference
searchParam.documentation: Modifier reference

searchParam.name: role
searchParam.documentation: Modifier role

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The current status of the questionnaire

searchParam.name: title
searchParam.documentation: The human-friendly name of the questionnaire

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Questionnaire type

searchParam.name: url
searchParam.documentation: The uri that identifies the questionnaire

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The business version of the questionnaire

searchParam.name: _content
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: _filter
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's data using a filter

searchParam.name: _has
searchParam.documentation: Return resources linked to by the given target

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: _language
searchParam.documentation: The language of the resource

searchParam.name: _lastUpdated
searchParam.documentation: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

searchParam.name: _profile
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given profile

searchParam.name: _security
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given security labels

searchParam.name: _source
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given source value (Resource.meta.source)

searchParam.name: _tag
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given tag

searchParam.name: _text
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: abstract
searchParam.documentation: Whether the structure is abstract

searchParam.name: base
searchParam.documentation: Definition that this type is constrained/specialized from

searchParam.name: base-path
searchParam.documentation: Path that identifies the base element

searchParam.name: context-type
searchParam.documentation: resource | datatype | extension

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The structure definition publication date

searchParam.name: derivation
searchParam.documentation: specialization | constraint - How relates to base definition

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: The description of the structure definition

searchParam.name: experimental
searchParam.documentation: For testing purposes, not real usage

searchParam.name: ext-context
searchParam.documentation: Where the extension can be used in instances

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: External identifier for the structure definition

searchParam.name: jurisdiction
searchParam.documentation: Intended jurisdiction for the structure definition

searchParam.name: keyword
searchParam.documentation: A code for the profile

searchParam.name: kind
searchParam.documentation: primitive-type | complex-type | resource | logical

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Computationally friendly name of the structure definition

searchParam.name: path
searchParam.documentation: A path that is constrained in the profile

searchParam.name: publisher
searchParam.documentation: Name of the publisher of the structure definition

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The current status of the structure definition

searchParam.name: title
searchParam.documentation: The human-friendly name of the structure definition

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Type defined or constrained by this structure

searchParam.name: url
searchParam.documentation: The uri that identifies the structure definition

searchParam.name: valueset
searchParam.documentation: A vocabulary binding reference

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The business version of the structure definition
